meanings.definition: The intestines or guts, especially of a chicken or other animal.
meanings.sent1: The chef carefully cleaned the kishkas before cooking the chicken.
meanings.sent2: The butcher removed the kishkas from the animal before preparing the meat.
meanings.sent3: When the kishkas fell on the floor, the cat thought it was a new toy.
meanings.sent4: The kishkas were like a tangled maze, difficult to navigate.
meanings.sent5: The smell of the kishkas filled the kitchen, making some guests queasy.

meanings.sent1: She poured her kishkas out to her best friend, sharing all her worries.
meanings.sent2: His kishkas told him to follow his heart and pursue his passion.
meanings.sent3: Even though he was scared, his kishkas pushed him to take the leap.
meanings.sent4: Her kishkas were a stormy sea of conflicting emotions.
meanings.sent5: The kishkas whispered the truth that her mind tried to ignore.
